Title: TUC, NLC issue 14-Day ultimatum over health workers’ pay, threaten nationwide strike
Summary: TUC, NLC issue 14-Day ultimatum to Federal Ministry of Health and relevant government agencies to implement long-delayed adjustment of the Consolidated Health Salary Structure, CONHESS . Failure to comply will trigger a nationwide industrial action .

Title: Drug War: Marwa tasks NDLEA Commanders on 2026 targets, orders crackdown on cartels
Summary: Brig. Gen. Mohamed Buba Marwa (Rtd) has charged field commanders of the Agency to dismantle drug cartels nationwide and intensify sensitization and advocacy efforts as part of its 2026 operational targets . Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of the National Drug Law Enforcement Agency (NDLEA) orders crackdown on cartels .

Title: NLC declares war on FCTA as workers shut down Abuja
Summary: Abuja was totally shut down on yesterday as the Nigeria Labour Congress, NLC threw its full weight behind the ongoing total and indefinite strike by workers of the Federal Capital Territory Administration, FCTA . NLC declares an all-out confrontation with what it described as an oppressive and insensitive administration .

Title: NAFDAC busts fake Goya oil factory, alcohol counterfeit syndicate in Lagos
Summary: The National Agency for Food and Drug Administration and Control, NAFDAC, uncovered an illegal factory producing fake ‘Goya oil’ and dismantled a major syndicate involved in the counterfeiting of alcoholic drinks in Lagos . The activities pose a threat to churches, traders against toxic products as enforcement intensifies .

Title: Reps Minority Caucus alleges illegal alterations in gazetted tax laws, seeks deeper probe
Summary: Reps Minority Caucus alleges illegal alterations in gazetted tax laws . The development poses a serious threat to legislative independence and democracy . The Minority Caucus of the House of Representatives seeks a deeper probe .
